column2: As a result of COVID-19 our global workforce continued to operate primarily in a work from home environment for

column4: . While pre-existing controls were not specifically designed to operate in our

column1: current work from home operating environment we believe that our internal controls over financial reporting continue to
be effective. We have continued to re-evaluate and refine our financial reporting process to provide reasonable
assurance that we could report our financial results accurately and timely.
